name: Modern Greek MediaPlayer
short_description: The project is based on the application that plays audio, video and even previews a picture such as the commonly use application like VLC player and windows media player etc. This was created using Microsoft Visual 2010 and perform like the VLC and windows media player. In our program, the user can play and view audio, video and preview picture. Adding of audio and video in the playlist is also one of the features of our software. Play, Pause, stop, repeat, next and previous are action that can use in the application. The created software was made for school purposes.  Comments and contribution to the software is very welcome.
summary: Let user play and view audio, video and preview picture with MG Player
